CustomField.formula:
( D_O_Risk_Adjusted_Rate__c *
IF( ISPICKVAL (D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$500,000"), 0.85, IF( ISPICKVAL (D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$1,000,000"), 1.00, IF( ISPICKVAL (D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$2,000,000"), 1.70, IF( ISPICKVAL (D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$3,000,000"), 2.25, IF( ISPICKVAL (D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$4,000,000"), 2.70, IF( ISPICKVAL (D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$5,000,000"), 3.15, 0 ))))))
- D_O_Risk_Adjusted_Rate__c)
CustomField.label: D&O Limit Modifier (Adj)
